post.description:
Allows for the update/cancel of the payment method from the payment manager.
* Required fiels: BAN, MandateReference, MethodType("Direct Debit"), Active
* Update direct debit:
  * "Active" should be sent as "true" in request
* Cancel direct debit:
  * "Active" should be sent as false in request
* In case of success, Updated MandateReference and Status as Success will be returned in response
* In case of any error, like direct debit not found, Status will be returned with the error message.

Active.description: Whether the payment method is active or to deactivate

post.description: RTAM (Real Time Availability Monitor) Stock Sync

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
1. ProductCode-EPC Physical Resource Product Code
2. FirstAvailableDate-First Available Date across warehouse, if multiple warehouses are present we expect the first available date
3. StockLevel- Total stock Red, Orange, Green based on stock level, can be handled at Vlocity

post.description: To capture trouble ticket information in CRM
to calculate ETF
To get order summary

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
1. BAN is mandatory for Suspension in case of Fraud/Collections
2. CaseId Mandatory for CancelSubscription
3. MSISDN is mandatory for collections and CancelSubscription
4. CH_ORIGIN, CH_ROUTINGLOCATION & PAC are required for CancelSubscription
5. Service is not required for collections
6. Action Disconnect/PartRestrict/FullRestrict/Resume/CallDivert
7. For Collections: Collections, For Fraud Reason Reference is PSI reference  Data

post.description:
# Change MSISDN for MNP

Asset type can be SIM, MSISDN, Handset. 
* When the Type is SIM, ICCID and IMSI values are sent. 
* When the Type is Handset, IMEI and SerialNumber values are sent. 
* When the Type is MSISDN, then MSISDN alone is sent. 

###### Note : All the existing assets sent should be active in CRM.


### Required fields are:
* OrderType
* OrderReason
* MSISDN
* RequestedDate
* PAC

OrderReason.description: Order Reason will be PortIn, PortInRollBack

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
1. Either ContactId, SubscriptionId or CustomerAccountId or MSISDN is mandatory
2. Channel-Channel reference data App/Retail/CC/IVR/Web
3. Type- Reference for Type pending businees inputs. PSI Referece data sheets needs to be referred
4. Reason-Reference for Reason & SubReason pending businees inputs.PSI Referece data sheets needs to be referred
